leve.name: Sticking It Out
leve.description: Elder members of the Knights Dragoon prefer lances smithed from pommel oreâ€”a hard substance that, while difficult to work, is believed to make the finest, sharpest heads. Unfortunately, the locations of the few remaining veins in Dravania were known only to the Sharlayans who took the information back with them to the Old World. If you were to find a vein of decent quality, I would pay much for the material.
leve.client: Temple Knights Second Commander Ser Handeloup
